name: Dissociation
description:
Manoeuvre yourself through the levels, but beware of the other personalities; they might harm people along the way, or expose you to threats! Position is key,  make sure you plan your route carefully before the next personality takes over!

If you're having trouble following the path, try and see if other personalities can get past your obstacle better than you can!

More levels will be added soon! 

And perhaps new personalities will emerge..

Features:

  • Puzzles
  • Strategy and planning

Follow the development on social media!
